verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Trump tweets he [V: will] announce ' decision ' on Iran nuclear deal at 2 p.m. Tuesday at White House .
WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Trump tweets [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: announce] [ARG1: ' decision ' on Iran nuclear deal] [ARGM-TMP: at 2 p.m. Tuesday] [ARGM-LOC: at White House] .
